name: CQ.Ext.direct.PollingProvider
doc:
Provides for repetitive polling of the server at distinct intervals.
The initial request for data...

configs.name: baseParams
configs.doc: An object containing properties which are to be sent as parameters on every polling request

configs.name: id
configs.doc: The unique id of the provider (defaults to an auto-assigned id). You should assign an id if you n...

configs.name: interval
configs.doc: How often to poll the server-side in milliseconds (defaults to 3000 - every 3 seconds).

configs.name: priority
configs.doc: Priority of the request (defaults to 3). See CQ.Ext.direct.Provider.priority.

configs.name: type
configs.doc: Required, undefined by default. The type of provider specified to CQ.Ext.Direct.addProvider to cr...

configs.name: url
configs.doc: The url which the PollingProvider should contact with each request. This can also be an imported ...

props.name: connect
props.doc: Abstract methods for subclasses to implement.

props.name: disconnect
props.doc: Abstract methods for subclasses to implement.

methods.name: connect
methods.doc:
Connect to the server-side and begin the polling process. To handle each
response subscribe to th...

methods.name: disconnect
methods.doc:
Disconnect from the server-side and stop the polling process. The disconnect
event will be fired ...

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: isConnected
methods.doc:
Returns whether or not the server-side is currently connected.
Abstract method for subclasses to ...

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

events.name: beforepoll
events.doc:
Fired immediately before a poll takes place, an event handler can return false
in order to cancel...

events.name: connect
events.doc: Fires when the Provider connects to the server-side

events.name: data
events.doc: Fires when the Provider receives data from the server-side

events.name: disconnect
events.doc: Fires when the Provider disconnects from the server-side

events.name: exception
events.doc: Fires when the Provider receives an exception from the server-side

events.name: poll
events.doc: This event has not yet been implemented.
